title: Sites Timeline & Map
text:
Timeline of Sites

# Placeholder for timeline chart
# Use ggplot2 or plotly for interactive timeline
# Color code by dominant land use (to be added)
library(ggplot2)
# Example data frame
sites <- data.frame(
  site_code = c("A", "B"),
  start_date = as.Date(c("2020-01-01", "2021-06-01")),
  end_date = as.Date(c("2022-01-01", "2023-06-01")),
  landuse = c("Urban", "Agriculture")
)
ggplot(sites, aes(x = site_code, ymin = start_date, ymax = end_date, color = landuse)) +
  geom_linerange(size = 6) +
  labs(y = "Date", x = "Site", color = "Land Use") +
  theme_minimal()

title: Sites Timeline & Map
text:
Map of Sites

# Placeholder for map
# Use leaflet for interactive map
library(leaflet)
sites <- data.frame(
  site_code = c("A", "B"),
  lat = c(33.5, 33.6),
  long = c(-112.1, -112.2),
  landuse = c("Urban", "Agriculture")
)
leaflet(sites) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(~long, ~lat, color = ~ifelse(landuse == "Urban", "blue", "green"), label = ~site_code)

title: Sites Timeline & Map
text:
Next Steps

Update charts and map with real data
Publish to GitHub Pages

title: Arthropods Sites Overview
text:
Welcome to the overview of arthropod monitoring sites in the Phoenix metropolitan area.

View the presentation for interactive charts and maps.
Data and code available in this repository.
